name: Alone on a Saturday Night
description:
One Saturday night I sat in my apartment, feeling like I had nothing to do and nowhere to go. Then I started making a game about it and suddenly I felt a lot better.

I decided this game would be my first game, but I was so lazy and did not know exactly what I wanted to do with it. I kept adding small features, but I never really sat down and decided what it was about, other than me in my apartment, feeling like shit and having nothing to do.

So It's probably really boring.
